org.settings4j.settings
Class DefaultFilter

java.lang.Object
  org.settings4j.settings.DefaultFilter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Filter
public class DefaultFilter
extends Object
implements Filter

The Default Implementation uses the RegEx-Pattern Expressions to evaluate the includes and excludes.

Author:
Harald.Brabenetz
